content: I've fallen in love with her again 💖💖💖
live_video/250327_PrincessYuna.mp4
It was this beautiful video:
Yesterday, Wednesday, I woke up with a YouTube notification
live_images/250321_chroma.png
Cabbit was my test subject.
I took three photos while holding the camera in my hand, assigned each one to an RGB channel, and then combined them into a single image.
I created chromatic aberration without algorithms or filters.
We will do marketing when I have a game to showcase the engine's capabilities.
I'll try to finish the wiki this week; that should be enough for a soft launch.
That’s what’s taking the most time, plus I need to write tutorials, templates, guides, and more.
live_images/250317_nekoplay_wiki.png

It's a web-based game framework that runs on the web, called NekoPlay. I had mentioned it in previous days. It's finished and should be available at niupleis.com, but I've been spending the past few weeks writing documentation in the form of a wiki...
live_images/250317nekoplay.png
This is what I've been working on:

<iframe width='360' height='203' src='https://www.youtube.com/embed/TamDOXponnM' title='YEJI "Air" M/V' frameborder='0' allow='accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share' referrerpolicy='strict-origin-when-cross-origin' allowfullscreen></iframe>
We are so Barack!!!
I’ve moved houses, had a tooth extracted, and I’m feeling better.
live_images/250225_nekoplay_maichan.png
Sorry for the inactivity, I moved houses and I'm sick.
live_images/250206_niupleis_update.png
New section: Games
niupleis.com has been updated.
live_images/250206_wpp.jpg
Behold, my new wallpaper.
Historically, double jumping has been a consequence of a poorly implemented 'coyote time'.
Let me explain...
Double jump = being dumb.
That's ready, it just needs some refinement. Next, I'll make her jump.
live_video/250131_HatsuneMikuWalking.mp4
Look at how this Miku walks! (And how she runs)​
live_images/250129_yuna.jpg
It's Cabbit! Yuna's plushie 💖💗💕💖💗💕💖
live_images/250129_cabbit.jpg
Look at this!!!
Consider that a teaser for the game (｡•̀ᴗ-)
live_images/250125_MikuSpritesheet.jpg
Anyway, I've been making assets for the game for two days:
Also, to avoid releasing it recklessly with nothing to show.
To debug and fix errors, I'm making a game (bigger than NekoNoid).
My game framework is practically finished.

I've seen iceberg channels narrate lost hentai media with more respect than true crime channels do for massacres
(⊙ _ ⊙ )
୧(๑•̀ᗝ•́)૭ Algorithms...
live_video/250116_zalgoyuna.mp4
I search "zalgo" on Pinterest, and what I found? Yuna XD

In fact, my framework is so versatile you can play it here:
And you can play it at niupleis.com.
NekoNoid is a text-based Arkanoid clone, I programmed it in about 4 hours.
This morning, I wanted to test a beta build, so I made NekoNoid.
I've been working on a game framework for a couple of weeks, and I'm testing it by making prototypes.
Tnkii has released a game: NekoNoid.
